description: Manages VPCs on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

display_text.description: Display text of the VPC. If not set, C(name) will be used for creating.

domain.description: Domain the VPC is related to.

vpc_offering.description: Name of the VPC offering. If not set, default VPC offering is used.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

tags.description: List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value). For deleting all tags, set an empty list e.g. C(tags: []).

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

account.description: Account the VPC is related to.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the VPC is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

zone.description: Name of the zone. If not set, default zone is used.

cidr.description: CIDR of the VPC, e.g. 10.1.0.0/16 All VPC guest networks' CIDRs must be within this CIDR. Required on C(state=present).

network_domain.description: Network domain for the VPC. All networks inside the VPC will belong to this domain.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.
